page.title: 16 DAILY LIFE: AN 11 YEAR OLD
page.content: On most mornings I am woken up by my dad at around 7 o'clock. I then get dressed and have breakfast which is already on the table. I am taken to school by my mum in her car. When I arrive at school it is about half past eight. School starts at 8.55. The morning lessons usually consist of Maths and English, with a fifteen minute break in the middle. Lunch is from 12.00 until 1.10. There are three sittings. The lessons in the afternoon are of a more prac- tical nature. School ends at 3.15. I usually arrive home at four o'clock. I then have my tea and go off to a club. When I return home I have a wash and get ready for bed. I then go downstairs and watch the television until about nine o'clock, when I go to bed.
